SELECT SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD(BOARD_NUMBER, BOARD_CATEGORY, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_REWARD, MEMBER_NUMBER) VALUES(#{boardNumber}, #{boardCategory}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardReward}, #{memberNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_NUMBER, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REWARD, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, b.BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, b.BOARD_ADOPT, b.BOARD_REPORT, b.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_BOARD b INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE BOARD_NUMBER = #{boardNumber}

SELECT b.BOARD_NUMBER, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REWARD, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, b.BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, b.BOARD_ADOPT, b.BOARD_REPORT, b.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_BOARD b INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER

SELECT b.BOARD_NUMBER, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REWARD, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, b.BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, b.BOARD_ADOPT, b.BOARD_REPORT, b.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_BOARD b INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber} AND b.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER

SELECT b.BOARD_NUMBER, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REWARD, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, b.BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, b.BOARD_ADOPT, b.BOARD_REPORT, b.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_BOARD b INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER AND b.BOARD_REPORT < 1

SELECT b.BOARD_NUMBER, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REWARD, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, b.BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, b.BOARD_ADOPT, b.BOARD_REPORT, b.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_BOARD b INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER ORDER BY BOARD_VIEWCOUNT DESC

SELECT D2.BOARD_NUMBER, D2.BOARD_TITLE, D2.BOARD_CONTENT, D2.BOARD_REWARD, D2.BOARD_CATEGORY, D2.BOARD_DATE, D2.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, D2.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, D2.MEMBER_NUMBER, m2.MEMBER_ID, m2.MEMBER_NAME, m2.MEMBER_RANK FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, D1.BOARD_NUMBER, D1.BOARD_TITLE, D1.BOARD_CONTENT, D1.BOARD_REWARD, D1.BOARD_CATEGORY, D1.BOARD_DATE, D1.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, D1.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, D1.MEMBER_NUMBER, m1.MEMBER_ID, m1.MEMBER_NAME, m1.MEMBER_RANK FROM ( SELECT b.BOARD_NUMBER, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REWARD, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, b.BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, b.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_BOARD b INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER ORDER BY BOARD_UPDATE_DATE DESC ) D1 JOIN TBL_MEMBER m1 ON D1.MEMBER_NUMBER = m1.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE ROWNUM < 6 ) D2 JOIN TBL_MEMBER m2 ON D2.MEMBER_NUMBER = m2.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE R > 0

SELECT b.BOARD_NUMBER, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REWARD, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, b.BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, b.BOARD_ADOPT, b.BOARD_REPORT, b.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_BOARD b INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER AND b.BOARD_CATEGORY = #{category} ORDER BY BOARD_UPDATE_DATE DESC

SELECT b.BOARD_NUMBER, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REWARD, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, b.BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, b.BOARD_ADOPT, b.BOARD_REPORT, b.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_BOARD b INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER AND b.BOARD_CATEGORY = '국어' ORDER BY BOARD_UPDATE_DATE DESC

SELECT b.BOARD_NUMBER, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REWARD, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, b.BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, b.BOARD_ADOPT, b.BOARD_REPORT, b.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_BOARD b INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER AND b.BOARD_CATEGORY = '수학' ORDER BY BOARD_UPDATE_DATE DESC

SELECT b.BOARD_NUMBER, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REWARD, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, b.BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, b.BOARD_ADOPT, b.BOARD_REPORT, b.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_BOARD b INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER AND b.BOARD_CATEGORY = '영어' ORDER BY BOARD_UPDATE_DATE DESC

SELECT b.BOARD_NUMBER, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REWARD, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, b.BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, b.BOARD_ADOPT, b.BOARD_REPORT, b.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_BOARD b INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER AND b.BOARD_CATEGORY = '사탐' ORDER BY BOARD_UPDATE_DATE DESC

SELECT b.BOARD_NUMBER, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REWARD, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, b.BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, b.BOARD_ADOPT, b.BOARD_REPORT, b.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_BOARD b INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER AND b.BOARD_CATEGORY = '과탐' ORDER BY BOARD_UPDATE_DATE DESC

SELECT b.BOARD_NUMBER, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REWARD, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, b.BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, b.BOARD_ADOPT, b.BOARD_REPORT, b.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_BOARD b INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER AND b.BOARD_CATEGORY = '한국사' ORDER BY BOARD_UPDATE_DATE DESC

SELECT b.BOARD_NUMBER, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REWARD, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, b.BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, b.BOARD_ADOPT, b.BOARD_REPORT, b.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_BOARD b INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER AND b.BOARD_CATEGORY = '제2외국어' ORDER BY BOARD_UPDATE_DATE DESC

SELECT b.BOARD_NUMBER, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REWARD, b.BOARD_CATEGORY, b.BOARD_DATE, b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, b.BOARD_ADOPT, b.BOARD_REPORT, b.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_BOARD b INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE b.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR b.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
